text: Syria rebels celebrate in captured Homs, set sights on Damascus  —  Syrian President Bashar al-Assad flew out of Damascus for an unknown destination on Sunday, two senior army officers told Reuters, as rebels said they had entered the capital with no sign of army deployments.
